meanings.definition: A machine for producing multiple copies of written material by pressing paper against a stencil with an inked roller.
meanings.sent1: The school office used a cyclostyles to make copies of the exam papers.
meanings.sent2: The old printing shop still has a working cyclostyles machine.
meanings.sent3: The cyclostyles hummed happily as it duplicated the important documents.
meanings.sent4: The cyclostyles was a silent magician, creating replicas with a touch of ink.
meanings.sent5: The cyclostyles clanked and whirred, bringing forth identical copies effortlessly.

meanings.definition: To produce multiple copies of written material using a cyclostyle machine.
meanings.sent1: She cyclostyles all the flyers for the event to save time.
meanings.sent2: We will cyclostyles the report for distribution to all departments.
meanings.sent3: He cyclostyles so fast, it's like watching a copy-making race.
meanings.sent4: The office cyclostyles away, creating duplicates in a blur of motion.
meanings.sent5: They cyclostyles diligently, ensuring everyone gets a copy of the memo.
